title: Skiing: beginning movements
brief_description: This film is designed for individuals or groups who want to learn correct skiing techniques. The film uses slow motion, stop-action, close-ups and animation to show a wide variety of techniques. One skier performs the techniques described, another demonstrates the steps to reinforce the concepts.
